divs: Sighting Detailsi was in a walmart parking lot and saw a sunset i wanted as a wallpaper,after the shot i started to zoom and crop. The object grew as a zoomed,nothing i have ever seen before,at first i thought it was dirt,but ruled it out quick as i noticed shape and hole in object,by the time i had noticed it on phone it was gone,this was an hour before an unexpected storm showed up,note the forming clouds.
Summary: caught on cellphone while taking random pic for wallpaper
trends: There have been no other sightings in Eden
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
